name: ConstantC
description:
In a distant future, a scientific research devoted to the Superluminal Space Station had an accident, the time inside the space station has been completely suspended. Players play a Crisis Rescue Robot equipped with a rotating gravity remote and an ability to make time re-flow locally. In order to prevent enlargement, the player must pass various challenges to repair the space station.

1 player
